lines.text: That's a lot of fish.
What do we do now?
Running would be a good idea.
[Nick was unsuccessful in conning the Guard, but Philippe was]
Alright. Move on.

[to Guard, sounding like Elvis]
Thank you. Thank you very much.

[to Nick]
Elvis Presley movies. He was The King.
We need... bigger guns.

[after accidentally hitting the Chrysler Building with a missile]
Oh! Damn, uh! That's a negative impact, sir! I repeat, that's a negative impact!
Negative impact? That's the goddamned Chrysler Building!

[holding up a doughnut]
No croissant?
No, monsieur.

[slurps drink, groans]
You call this coffee?
I call this America.

[Repeated line after someone mispronounces his name]
It's Tatopoulos.
Wait, I don't get it... If he's the first of his kind, how can he be pregnant? Doesn't he need a mate?
Not if he reproduces asexually.
Where's the fun in that?
What the hell's the matter with you people?
[shouts]
You've caused more damage than that goddamn thing did!
I am Philippe Roaché, DGSE - Direction Générale de la Sécurité Extérieure.
It sounds big.
French Secret Service.
Oh.
This thing is much too big to be some lost dinosaur.
I can't believe it, uh... he did all of this and... we did nothing to him.
Ah, that's not true. We fed him.
Where did you find this guy?
He's from France.
I've always wanted to join the French Foreign Legion.
Oh! Oh you gotta be kidding me man, we're in his mouth! We're IN HIS MOUTH!
What did you, see old man?
Gojira. Gojira.
What's with the chewing gum?
It makes us look more American.
He is scum! As far as he's concerned, you're just a pair of breasts that talk.
Hey, there's an image.
The radiation isn't an anomaly, it's the clue.
[about breaking up with Nick]
It's been eight years. Some people change.
Most people don't.
You gonna be all right?
Yeah, Audrey's gonna spend the night with us.
Cool. A threesome. That's excellent. I'm a little tired.
[Animal appears on TV]
That's my husband! That's my husband! Oh, my... I'm gonna kill him!
[jumps, whoops]
How close did you get to the thing?
...I got pretty close.
[Animal is about to sneak out of his apartment]
What are you doing?
Can't let Lucy know. She'll hurt me.

Ladies and Gentlemen, we New Yorkers like to believe we've seen it all... what you're going to see right now will shock you beyond belief. This is, uh, footage we have that indicates that there is a *dinosaur* loose in Manhattan.
There's no Ranger game on tonight.
Uh, you better step on it, Mr. French.

[after Godzilla discovers one of his dead offspring]
He looks angry.
Okay, party's over. Time to leave.
[shoots out the window]
Anyone care to join me?
Hey, Joe! Gonna catch one of them little fish in the East River?
I hope so.But you never know.I mean, today could be my lucky day.
The only thing you'll catch is a cold.
Wrong floor.
He's not some monster trying to evade you. He's just an animal. If you find what he wants, then he'll come to you.
Well, don't tell me what it isn't; tell me what the hell it is.
Well, what do we know? Uh, it was first sighted off the French Polynesian Pacific. That area has been exposed to dozens of nuclear tests over the past 30 years.
This is not good! This is not good!
[Caiman is complaining to his superiors via cell phone]

why we're the only station in town that doesn't have the Korean grocery hold-up as our lead. I mean, what's our lead? Rain, again! It's stupid. I know, the pressure's at the parties you go to is that we're the classy station. I'm sorry, I just don't give a rat's ass about a war in some country whose name I can't even pronounce. How about a real story?
[Caiman's secretary looks behind him and sees Godzilla walk past the window]
Sir? I think your story just walked by the window.
[Caiman turns around just as Godzilla disappears from view. He turns back, only to miss Godzilla's tail sweep over the windows]
What?
[Caiman resumes talking on his phone]
Maybe we can get the Korean grocer's hospital.
